sources.title: Trouble in Texas
sources.description: While Tex Ritter (as Tex Masters) sings "Down the Colorado Trail", accompanied by harmonica-playing sidekick Horace Murphy (as Lucky), pretty government agent Rita Hayworth (as Carmen Serano) is sent out to investigate a series of mysterious rodeo deaths. Ms. Hayworth and Mr. Ritter cross paths in Middletown Valley, where Ritter is looking for the gang that killed his brother.

sources.title: Trouble in Texas (1937) TEX RITTER
sources.description:
Stars: Tex Ritter, Rita Hayworth, White Flash
 Director: Robert N. Bradbury

 Rodeo stars are being killed with poisoned needles, and Tex Ritter is next on the list.

sources.title: Trouble in Texas (1937) Tex Ritter & Rita Hayworth | Action, Adventure, Musical | Full Movie
sources.description:
TEX BLASTS RODEO RACKETEERS…AND WINS A BEAUTIFUL SENORITA!
Rodeo stars are being killed with poisoned needles, and Tex Ritter is next on the list.

Director: Robert N. Bradbury
Writers: Robert Emmett Tansey, Lindsley Parsons
Stars: Tex Ritter, Rita Hayworth, White Flash
Genres: Classics, Action, Adventure, Musical

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Tex is on the rodeo circuit looking for the men that killed his brother and he finds them in Middleton. Barker expects his man Squint to win the prize money but when Tex starts winning all the events, they put the poisoned needle in his halter rope, planning to have him mysteriously die just as the others did.
metadata.Actors: Tex Ritter, Rita Hayworth, White Flash
